Title: CRUD Teams
Description: As a user, I want to create, update, delete teams.

Title: Assessment Framework CRUD
Description: As an admin, I want to manage assessment frameworks.

Title: Scoring Engine
Description: As a data scientist, I want to calculate MBTI/Big Five/DISC scores.

Title: Dashboard UI
Description: As a manager, I want to view analytics on a dashboard.

Title: Recommendation Engine
Description: As a manager, I want AI recommendations for team composition.

Title: Slack Integration
Description: As a user, I want Slack notifications for team insights.

Title: Mobile Responsive UI
Description: As a user, I want to use the platform on mobile devices.

Title: GDPR Compliance
Description: As an org, we must meet GDPR compliance.

Title: app Unit Tests
Description: As a app dev, I want 90% coverage.

Title: Usability Testing
Description: As a QA, I want to test with beta users.

Title: Infrastructure Deployment
Description: As a DevOps lead, I want production infra configured.

Title: Documentation Completion
Description: As a technical writer, I want docs ready before launch.

Title: Go-Live
Description: As a team, we want to execute the launch smoothly.
